data.text: Ndangukomya, Nguluwi ndo yanojile kwa wanhu wa Isilaeli,
Behi ng'hatu ndahakwang'wale,
kwa vila nandiwonela fihi walingidaya,
Kwa vila hewo hambe wafichigwe na magazo,
Magazo ga wanhu hagawafichile hewo,
Kidaya kuwa ugasi wa hewo misingo,
Meho ga hewo gangumemaga wihe,
Wanguwalonjeleza wanji na kulonga gehile,
Kwa milomo ja hewo wangulonga kota wangulongoza kilanga,
Mbaka wanhu wa heye wanguwawinza,
Wangulonga, â€œNguluwi howeza kuvizela?
Ulole, wanhu wehile vyowawele!
Ndaze, ndilolela hihi hela welile mnhumbula,
Nemisi yeng'ha nhowigwa,
Wone ndahalonjile ago hazelu kota hewo,
Lelo, nanjeza kijesa kwa chiwalo cha mbuli ayi,
mbaka lonyinjile honhu ha hegwe helile,
Ndangukomya hegwe kwanguwawika honhu kuli halingutelela,
Wangudumigwa baho du,
Gwa Mkulu, houkwinuka, hewo wangwajilila baho du,
Lombone usungu mnhumbula,
nandali yasowile nyhala na mpoka,
Ila, gwa Nguluwi, nda hamwe na hegwe mazuwa gose,
Hegwe kwangundongoza kwa ulanguso wa hegwe,
Whaani yoweza kunhanza kilanga, wone hauwele hegwe?
Hanga ndiwe ndilihela mong'ho kuli lukuli na kuli muhe,
Ulole! Yalingibagula na hegwe, ndangukomya kodumigwa,
Ila kwa heni, chondilingugana ndo kuwa habehi na Nguluwi hela.
